Package ca.openosp.openo.util

Class Appender

java.lang.Object
ca.openosp.openo.util.Appender
public class Appender extends Object
Facility class for appending strings.

      public boolean append(Appender appender)

    • appendNonEmpty

      public boolean appendNonEmpty(Object... objects)
      Converts the objects provided into a string and appends this string. Please note that if there is at least one null object in the parameter list provided, nothing is appended to this appender.
      Parameters:
      objects - Non-null objects to append. In case there is at least one null object, the append process is halted.
      Returns:
      Returns true if content of this appender has been modified and false otherwise.

    • append

      public boolean append(String string)
      Trims and appends the specified string to this instance, inserting the separator, if necessary.
      Parameters:
      string - String to be appended
      Returns:
      Returns true if the specified string was appended and false otherwise.

    • length

      public int length()
      Gets length of the currently appended strings for this appender
      Returns:
      Returns the number of characters for the strings appended
